level.heading: Partner's liability to other partners after dissolution.

level.text: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (b) of this section and § 29- 603.06, after dissolution, a partner shall be liable to the other partners for the partner's share of any partnership liability incurred under § 29-608.04.

A partner that, with knowledge of the dissolution, incurs a partnership liability under § 29-608.04(2) by an act that is not appropriate for winding up the partnership business shall be liable to the partnership for any damage caused to the partnership arising from the liability.
